PERIPHERAL BLOOD STEM CELL TRANSPLANTATION : Patients undergo TCR-αβ+ CD19+ deplete haploidentical donor peripheral blood stem cell transplantation day 0 . ZOLEDRONATE ADMINISTRATION : Patients receive zoledronate IV transplant determine assigned treatment group ( Cohort ) . Patients Cohort A receive zoledronate . Follow-up assessment occur transplantation .
